alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lee County through 415 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fort Myers to 9 miles southwest of Lovers Key State Park. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Lovers Key State Park, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Pineland, St. James City, Villas, Three Oaks and Palmona Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
